info.task: navigate from filled in expanded combobox to last option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate from a filled in, expanded combobox to the last option in a listbox popup interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandComboboxAndSetValueToA
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'a'

user: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Arkansas') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (5) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (5) is conveyed
